Lexi

Korean: 렉시

Sheboygan, Wisconsin

Height:

Group (2023-present):
VCHA

Introduction

Lexi (렉시) is a Hmong-American singer and dancer. She is the leader of the girl group VCHA formed by the survival show "A2K" under JYP Entertainment. She debuted in VCHA on January 26, 2024, with their first single album 'Girls of the Year".

Jan 26, 2024-present

Fun facts

1
Lexi's favorite seasons are Fall & Winter. She likes it when it's cold because then she can wrap something around her to feel warm. She prefers that feeling rather than feeling hot and wanting to feel cold air.
…
2
Before her debut, Lexus had the opportunity to participate in a relay dance with Kep1er.
…
3
Lexi's special skill is "making a really good Hmong-style papaya salad".
…
4
She trained in ballet for 12 years.
…
5
Lexi is a good cook, but sometimes she sets off the fire alarm.
…
6
Lexi's ideal day would be on her bed, under the covers, on her phone, and watching a movie/playing games.
…
7
Her favorite movie is Coraline, which she's been obsessed with since she was a kid.
…
8
Lexi's favorite number is 22.
…
9
During her free time, she likes to play games, watch movies, and chill in her bed.
…
10
Lexi's favorite food is beef tendon soup, but on one condition: it has to be made by her grandma.
